title: Waterfront Croatian Island Escape with Nightly Dinner Included
description: Discover why Croatia is one of Europe's hottest travel destinations for 2019 and embrace island life with a stay at the waterfront Hotel Liburna. Situated on the island of Korcula, dubbed “Little Dubrovnik” thanks to its medieval squares and churches, Korcula is the perfect way to experience Croatia without the crowds. Between beach hopping and lunching on fresh seafood, you can enjoy your included daily buffet breakfast, nightly buffet dinner, bottle of wine on arrival and early check-in and late check-out.

title: Croatian Island Escape with Daily Dining
description: Escape to the peaceful paradise of Croatia’s Korcula island with a stay at Hotel Korkyra. Located in the tranquil port town of Vela Luka, you’re surrounded by a beautiful natural harbour, a 40-minute drive from Korcula main town. Go island-hopping to neighbouring Proizd, with a three-course lunch at the restaurant here included. You’ll also enjoy a welcome drink, a welcome gift, plus daily breakfast and nightly dinner.

title: Croatian Island Escape with Daily Dining
description:
Escape to a peaceful corner of Croatia with an idyllic island stay at Hotel Korkyra, Korcula. Nestled in the tranquil port town of Vela Luka, the hotel places you only moments from the sparkling waters of the Adriatic that surround the stunning natural harbour.

Experience island hospitality with a welcome drink on arrival - plus, go island hopping to neighbouring Proizd and enjoy a complimentary three-course lunch at the restaurant. With daily breakfast and dinner included and an on-site wellness centre offering a sauna, gym and massages, you’ll never want to leave this Dalmatian dream.
